name: What the deuce did he want to go in that galley for? He had no idea of what would happen.
name_original: What the deuce did he want to go in that galley for? He had no idea of what would happen.
description:
Hey there!

Here is our game, made in 24 hours for the Epic Game Jam 2016 with Unreal Engine 4.12.

We were 2,5 from the Concrete Games studio on the Project : Corentin and me and Matlab who made the title and the hamster.
It is a game about Post apocalyptic creation.
It takes the shape of an FPS.
It is funny (I believe).

I hope you'll like this silly project.

Here is the link to our Itch.io page : Concrete Games
